title: Why does my windows 10 desktop computer not see my Google Pixel 4a running Android 11 when I connect
content:
I went in and changed in developer options the USB default to file transfer/Android auto which is the only file transfer option I see. Also made sure drivers were up to date on my desktop computer. But when I hook my pixel 4a up to my computer and unlock my phone, my computer doesn't see it..
 Any workarounds? Thanks!
  Jack
